metadata.name: Suspicious Process Created Via Wmic.EXE
metadata.comment: Detects WMIC executing "process call create" with suspicious calls to processes such as "rundll32", "regsrv32", etc.

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (lower(activity_id) = lower('1') AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('process ')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('call ')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('create ')) AND (contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('rundll32')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('bitsadmin')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('regsvr32')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('cmd.exe /c ')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('cmd.exe /k ')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('cmd.exe /r ')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('cmd /c ')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('cmd /k ')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('cmd /r ')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('powershell')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('pwsh')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('certutil')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('cscript')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('wscript')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('mshta')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('\\users\\public\\')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('\\windows\\temp\\')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('\\appdata\\local\\')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('%temp%')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('%tmp%')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('%programdata%')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('%appdata%')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('%comspec%')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('%localappdata%'))))

output.summary: Detects WMIC executing "process call create" with suspicious calls to processes such as "rundll32", "regsrv32", etc.
